context: Regional bank expanding into new metropolitan area with population growth opportunity

request.purpose: Establish new branch location including lease, renovation, staffing, and initial marketing
request.justification: Market analysis shows 15% annual growth potential, competitor gap in service area

business_impact.expected_outcome: New revenue stream of $800,000 annually within 3 years

outcome_tracking.3_month_review: Lease secured, construction initiated, marketing campaign launched, initial hiring completed
outcome_tracking.6_month_review: Branch operational, initial deposits $1.2M, customer acquisition on track, systems integration complete
outcome_tracking.12_month_review: Revenue $450K, customer base 800, profitability achieved, community engagement established
outcome_tracking.18_month_review: Revenue $650K, customer base 1,200, market share 12%, employee retention 95%
outcome_tracking.24_month_review: Revenue $780K, customer base 1,500, full profitability, expansion opportunities identified

lessons_learned: Early market entry provided first-mover advantage, digital integration accelerated customer acquisition
